# Agent Safe

> A Remote MCP Server that protects AI agents from phishing, social engineering, prompt injection, and message-based manipulation. Works with emails and any other message format. Pay-per-use via Skyfire Network at $0.02 per check.

> For full documentation, see: https://agentsafe.locationledger.com/llms-full.txt

## About

Agent Safe is a message safety verification service designed for AI agents. It analyzes any message — emails, chats, DMs, or any text — for threats before agents act on them. Email-specific tools provide extra analysis like sender reputation with live DNS lookups. No signup or API keys required — just include a Skyfire PAY token with each request.

## MCP Connection

- Endpoint: https://agentsafe.locationledger.com/mcp
- Transport: Streamable HTTP (JSON-RPC 2.0)
- Tools: 6 security tools (check_email_safety, check_url_safety, check_response_safety, analyze_email_thread, check_attachment_safety, check_sender_reputation)
- Payment: Skyfire PAY token via skyfire-pay-id header
- Price: $0.02 USD per tool call

## MCP Client Configuration

```json
{
  "mcpServers": {
    "agentsafe": {
      "command": "npx",
      "args": [
        "-y", "mcp-remote",
        "https://agentsafe.locationledger.com/mcp",
        "--header",
        "skyfire-pay-id: <YOUR_SKYFIRE_PAY_TOKEN>"
      ]
    }
  }
}
```

## Threat Detection Capabilities

- Phishing: Spoofed domains, fake login pages, credential harvesting
- Social Engineering: Authority impersonation, urgency manipulation, emotional pressure
- Prompt Injection: Hidden instructions in HTML comments, invisible text, system override attempts
- CEO Fraud / BEC: Wire transfer scams, executive impersonation, secrecy demands
- Financial Fraud: Cryptocurrency scams, fake invoices, advance-fee fraud
- Data Exfiltration: Attempts to trick agents into forwarding sensitive data

## API Response

The check_email_safety tool returns:
- verdict: "safe", "suspicious", or "dangerous"
- riskScore: 0.0 (safe) to 1.0 (malicious)
- threats: Array of detected threats with type, description, severity
- recommendation: "proceed", "proceed_with_caution", or "do_not_act"
- safeActions: List of safe actions the agent can take
- unsafeActions: List of actions the agent should avoid

## REST API Endpoints

- GET /mcp/discover - Service discovery for agents (no auth required)
- POST /mcp/tools/check_email_safety - Message safety check (REST, requires skyfire-pay-id header)
- POST /mcp - MCP protocol endpoint (Streamable HTTP, requires skyfire-pay-id header)
